title: Why shouldn't kids have sex? - Quora

response.answer_text: Unable to support if a child has been bornUnable to maintain support and understand of emotionsUnable to maintain a job and schoolLack of understanding of the human bodyThere are few other issues to tackle, but these are the main things why a underage teen or child should not be having sexual intercourse. I think teaching sexual education would be fine as they’ll be able to learn more about how the human body functions, sexually-transmitted diseases and the consequences of sex, too! EDIT: Thanks for the edit update User-11173927360212585733

On a physical level, most children are not capable of having sex. It may cause significant damage.Most kids don't understand what sex is, and are too immature to understand the possible consequences - i.e., sexually transmitted infections and, if they've started puberty, pregnancy.Sex is an emotionally vulnerable act that requires very good communication skills and comfort with one's own body. Most children are not sure what's good for them and what isn't, and most can't communicate well enough to have a fully consensual sexual encounter.
